entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bancroft

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 14.

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
